subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital city of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान की राजधानी किस शहर से है ?
explanation_en:
Jaipur is the capital city of Rajasthan.
राजस्थान की राजधानी है Jaipur.
(Translation: Jaipur is the capital city of Rajasthan)
explanation_hi:
राजस्थान की राजधानी है Jaipur.
(Translation: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan)
Jaipur is the capital city of Rajasthan.
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.
